card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to my Alexa speech based game: The Escape. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to my Alexa speech based game, The Escape. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

card.title: Welcome
card.text:
You wake up in a dark room to the smell of burning wood, with no memory of how you got here. All you know is that your head is throbbing and you need to get out of here, wherever here is.

Trying to move you realise that your right hand is chained to the wall.

With your eyes now adjusted to the darkness around you, you can now look around to find the key for the chain.
card.prompt: Say "look left" or "look right" to try and find the key to the chain.

card.title: Looking Left
card.text:
Looking left you see a stick that could be used as a hook to grab a set of hanging keys.

Grabbing the stick you notice that it is small enough to fit inside the lock and you could possibly jimmy the lock with it.

voice.intro:
Looking to your left, you see a stick that could be used as a hook to grab a set of hanging keys.

Grabbing the stick, you notice it's small enough to fit into the lock, you wonder if it's possible to jimmy the lock with it.
voice.prompt: Say "look right" to continue trying to find the key or say "try the stick" to use it to open the lock.

card.title: Looking Right
card.text:
You look right, JACKPOT!!! You see a set of 4 keys hung up on the wall.

Using your newly acquired stick you grab the set of keys and unlock the chain holding you and walk to the other end of the room. 

Getting there you find two doors, both are locked and both have an emergency exit sign on them.

card.title: Looking Right
card.text:
You look right, JACKPOT!!! You see a set of 4 keys hung up on the wall.

However, when trying to reach them you realise that they are too far away for you to reach.

voice.intro:

card.title: You try the stick
card.text:
You try the stick, it seems to be going well, you can hear the gears in the lock moving nicely.

!!!CRACK!!!

The stick snaps, the sound reverberating around the room. You hear the sound of footsteps running towards you, a bright light appears at the end of the room and you see the silhouette of a man shouting at you in a language you don't understand. Still shouting, he comes over, takes what remains of your stick away and wacks you over the back of the head with the butt of his gun.

You lost. Better luck next time! :)

card.title: Open Door 1
card.text:
You unlock the door with one of the keys you got earlier, it opens to another dark room.

You enter the room but don't see the hole in the floor which you promptly fall into.

Game Over!

card.title: Open Door 2
card.text:
You unlock the door with one of the keys you got earlier, it opens to the outside.

Seeing no one around you make a run for it to a fleet of burnt orange Dodge Chargers.

You find the keys for one under its wheel arch, and use it to get the HELL OUT OF DODGE.

Congratulations you Escaped the room and won the game. I hope you had fun :)
